div.p: My first 3 years I was a behaved child, my dad was living in my house and he was the disciplinarian, he brought discipline
into the house so you know obviously fear you wouldn’t want to cross the line or anything like that so the first 2 or 3 years
I was kind of like a good boy but, yeah, the last 2 years I was trouble setting off fire extinguishers and you know running around,
skiving school, I did not take school seriously one bit, not one bit, I didn’t take... I even missed exams because I couldn’t be bothered
I didn’t have the patience to just sit in a class for 50 minutes let alone like to do a 2 hour exam or spend the whole day inside
school because you ain’t got no bills to pay and you ain’t got no responsibilities it was just carelessness
like you know just didn’t care, why not? Because of my clowning around and messing around at school you know I couldn’t get into college
I couldn’t get into the course that I wanted to get on...
